entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:44 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: E 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Risk of thunderstorms this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
